title: User Registration with Valid Details
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using valid email and password and then navigates to the main screen.

steps.description: Navigate to registration screen
Input valid email and password
Submit registration form
User is registered successfully and redirected to the main screen

title: User Login with Correct Email and Password
description: Verify successful login with correct email and password and session persistence on app restart.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen
Input valid registered email and correct password
Click login button
User is logged in successfully and redirected to main screen
Restart application
User session is persisted and main screen is shown directly

title: Login Failure with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify login error message when incorrect email or password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen
Input invalid email or wrong password
Click login button
Login fails with appropriate error message

title: Google Sign-In Authentication Successfully
description: Verify that a user can sign in using Google account and session persists across app restarts.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen
Select Google Sign-In button
Select a valid Google account for authentication
User is authenticated via Google and redirected to main screen
Restart the app
User session is persisted, auto login succeeds

title: Forgot Password Email Reset Flow
description: Verify that user can request password reset via email link and receive confirmation notification.

steps.description: Navigate to Forgot Password screen
Input registered email address
Submit reset password request
App confirms that password reset email has been sent

title: OCR Medical Report Scanning with Valid Input
description: Verify that the camera capture successfully extracts text via OCR within 5 seconds and AI analysis is performed and report saved.

steps.description: Open medical report scanning screen
Capture medical report image with camera
OCR text extraction completes within 5 seconds
AI-driven medical analysis of extracted text completes successfully
Save scanned report
Medical report is saved and visible in report list

title: OCR Handling of Poor Image Quality
description: Verify the behavior when low quality or blurred images are scanned for OCR extraction.

steps.description: Open medical report scanning screen
Capture blurry or low-light medical report image
App displays an error or suggests retaking the image

title: Schedule Medicine Reminder and Receive Notification
description: Verify successful scheduling of medicine reminder and receiving notification at scheduled time with proper interactive actions.

steps.description: Open medicine reminders screen
Schedule a medicine reminder at specific future time
Reminder is stored and displayed in list
Wait until scheduled reminder time
Notification appears with Take, Snooze, and Dismiss buttons

title: Reminder Interaction: Take Action
description: Verify that selecting the Take action on medicine reminder notification marks the reminder as completed.

steps.description: Receive medicine reminder notification
Select Take action on notification
Reminder is marked as taken and notification is dismissed

title: Reminder Interaction: Snooze Action
description: Verify that selecting Snooze postpones the notification by the predefined snooze interval.

steps.description: Receive medicine reminder notification
Select Snooze action on notification
Notification is dismissed and reappears after snooze period

title: Reminder Interaction: Dismiss Action
description: Verify that selecting Dismiss cancels the reminder notification without marking taken.

steps.description: Receive medicine reminder notification
Select Dismiss action on notification
Notification is dismissed without changing reminder status

title: Medicine Reminder Persistence After Device Reboot
description: Verify that scheduled medicine reminders persist and notifications fire correctly after device reboot.

steps.description: Schedule a medicine reminder
Simulate device reboot
Medicine reminder is still scheduled post reboot
Wait for scheduled reminder notification
Notification is triggered at proper time after reboot

title: Generate Emergency QR Code with Valid Medical Data
description: Verify that the app generates a QR code conforming to medical-agent.v1 schema including selected medical info and that it can be scanned by third-party reader.

steps.description: Navigate to Emergency QR code generator screen
Select relevant medical information fields
Generate QR code
QR code is generated and visible on screen
Scan generated QR code using generic QR scanning app
Scanned content conforms to medical-agent.v1 schema and is human-readable

title: Emergency QR Code Sharing Functionality
description: Verify that the generated emergency QR code can be shared via supported sharing intents.

steps.description: Generate an emergency QR code
Select share option
Sharing interface opens and user can share QR code image to other apps

title: AI Medical Chatbot Basic Conversation
description: Verify that the AI chatbot responds accurately and empathically to simple medical queries with maintained context.

steps.description: Open AI medical chatbot interface
Send a simple medical question such as symptoms inquiry
Chatbot responds accurately with empathic tone
Send follow-up question related to initial query
Chatbot maintains conversation context and responds appropriately

title: AI Chatbot Medical Document Upload and Analysis
description: Verify that uploading a medical document triggers AI analysis and the chatbot provides a meaningful summary.

steps.description: Open AI chatbot and upload medical document
Document is accepted and OCR analysis is started
Chatbot provides accurate summary of medical document content

title: AI Chatbot Emergency Detection during Conversation
description: Verify that chatbot detects emergency keywords or phrases and triggers emergency alert behavior.

steps.description: Send message containing emergency keywords (e.g., chest pain, severe bleeding)
Chatbot detects emergency and provides appropriate urgent advice or alert

title: Pharmaceutical Intelligence Multi-Agent Query Handling
description: Verify the multi-agent system delegates pharmaceutical research queries to relevant agents and compiles comprehensive reports.

steps.description: Request pharmaceutical data such as clinical trials or patent insights
Master agent delegates requests to specialized agents
Comprehensive report is generated accurately including data from all relevant agents

title: Health Tracking Data Storage and Retrieval
description: Verify that user health history items and wellness goals are correctly stored in the database and can be retrieved and displayed.

steps.description: Add new health history item and wellness goal
Health tracking data is saved successfully in local Room database
Reload health tracking screen
Previously saved data is correctly retrieved and displayed

title: Accurate BMI Calculation in Health Tracker
description: Verify that BMI is calculated accurately from user inputted height and weight and matches expected values.

steps.description: Input various combinations of height and weight values
BMI is calculated using the correct formula and displayed correctly
Edge cases such as zero or extremely low/high values handled gracefully

title: Logout Clears Session and Local Preferences
description: Verify that logging out clears authentication session, local DataStore preferences and redirects user to login screen.

steps.description: Login to the app
Select logout option
User authentication session and local data stored in preferences are cleared
App redirects to login screen

title: Encrypted Storage and Secure Network Communication
description: Verify that sensitive user data stored locally is encrypted and all network calls are performed over secure HTTPS connections as per HIPAA compliance.

steps.description: Store sensitive user health information locally
Local data is encrypted on disk
Initiate network request to Firebase backend
Network traffic is over secure HTTPS protocol

title: App Launch Performance Under 3 Seconds
description: Verify that the app launches from cold start to splash screen and then main screen within 3 seconds on supported devices.

steps.description: Cold start the app on test device
Total time from app launch to main screen display is less than 3 seconds

title: AI Chatbot Response Time Within 10 Seconds
description: Verify that AI chatbot responds to user messages within 10 seconds under normal network conditions.

steps.description: Send a medical query to the chatbot
Chatbot replies are received within 10 seconds

title: Invalid Email Format During Registration
description: Verify that entering an invalid email format on registration screen displays appropriate validation message and prevents submission.

steps.description: Navigate to registration screen
Input invalid email format and valid password
Attempt to submit registration form
Form validation prevents submission and displays email format error
